snippet: Play in the Second World Mind Sports Games will begin in Lille, France, on Friday and end on Aug. 23.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column describes deal played at the final of the 2008 World Mind Sports Games.
lead_paragraph: Play in the Second World Mind Sports Games will begin in Lille, France, on Friday and end on Aug. 23.

headline.seo: Bridge — Second World Mind Sports Games in Lille, France
headline.main: Second World Mind Sports Games in France
